summary: Put on a good pair of glasses or contact lenses, and you’ll see I’ve started another David Tennant drawing - that one promo pic...
caption:
Put on a good pair of glasses or contact lenses, and you’ll see I’ve started another David Tennant drawing - that one promo pic from Spies of Warsaw, bc Jean-François tu resteras toujours dans mon cœur ❣☺️
It’s a rather big format, there are thousands of details, so this’ll be probably finished in 2184, but we’ll try! 🙊✏️

summary: I have a Doctor Who  theory
body:
I have a Doctor Who theory

The last line before regeneration (“ I don’t want to go, I will always remember when the doctor was me) is not the doctor but is infact a fourth wall break where the actor is speaking directly to the audience as one last goodbye. To me it makes the last lines have even more impact. It’s not the doctor saying goodbye it’s the actors themselves

reblog.comment:
I have a Doctor Who theory

The last line before regeneration (“ I don’t want to go, I will always remember when the doctor was me) is not the doctor but is infact a fourth wall break where the actor is speaking directly to the audience as one last goodbye. To me it makes the last lines have even more impact. It’s not the doctor saying goodbye it’s the actors themselves

trail.content_raw:
I have a Doctor Who theory

The last line before regeneration (“ I don’t want to go, I will always remember when the doctor was me) is not the doctor but is infact a fourth wall break where the actor is speaking directly to the audience as one last goodbye. To me it makes the last lines have even more impact. It’s not the doctor saying goodbye it’s the actors themselves
trail.content:
I have a Doctor Who theory

The last line before regeneration (“ I don’t want to go, I will always remember when the doctor was me) is not the doctor but is infact a fourth wall break where the actor is speaking directly to the audience as one last goodbye. To me it makes the last lines have even more impact. It’s not the doctor saying goodbye it’s the actors themselves

summary: Tom Baker: "Matt Smith Made Me Very Welcome" on The Day of the Doctor Set
title: Tom Baker: "Matt Smith Made Me Very Welcome" on The Day of the Doctor Set
body:
Tom Baker: “Matt Smith Made Me Very Welcome” on The Day of the Doctor Set

Tom Baker, the Fourth Doctor himself, has revealed that no one else apart from Matt Smith welcomed him to the set of 50th anniversary special, The Day of the Doctor.

In an interview for the Doctor Who – The Collection: Season 12 Blu-ray boxset, which is released on 2nd July 2018 in the UK, the actor recalls:

“Matt Smith is a darling young man; he made me very welcome. He was the only one who…

View On WordPress

tags: it's dirty and gross but i feel worse about the dead link
i cropped and edited the new upload as penance
title: PSA: MONDAYS SUCK
body:
Someone tried to (did?) hack my YouTube page at around 1am this morning, so YouTube disabled the GT live video. Because that makes sense?!

All 39 reblogs now have dead links. I’ve sent a message with a new post/link to everyone who reblogged it the first time around or sent messages about it earlier. 

Usually I couldn’t care less about the number of notes a post gets, but I know I was the only one who had this video. It also guts me that people will have broken links on their blogs and anyone who sees that is missing out.


So I can’t believe I’m going to say this but, please reblog the the new link below or the updated one idc which just make sure the new link works…


NEW POST WITH WORKING LINK

OLD POST WITH UPDATED LINK                                                    (will only work if reblogged after 2:30am EST - IF YOU REBLOGGED OR QUEUED IT YESTERDAY YOU HAVE A DEAD LINK)

to the ass-hat who tried to steal my youtube…
